data.title: Forvis Mazars
data.text:
Svein-Egil Rydland is one of the partners in the audit department at Forvis Mazars in Bergen. He is a certified public accountant (CPA) and has worked in both large and small audit firms auditing companies across various industries and sizes.

Svein-Egil studied at NHH (Norwegian School of Economics), started his career at EY, and spent a period at a local audit firm in Bergen, Acceptor Revisjon, before joining Forvis Mazars in 2018. His client portfolio generally represents a cross-section of business activities in Western Norway, with notable clients in the fisheries sector and foundations.

His clients include organizations such as Stiftelsen Seilskipet Statsraad Lehmkuhl, Bergen Caravan AS, and Stiftelsen International School of Bergen.
